com.scriptedmc.script.enchantment

Class SMCEnchantment.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scriptedmc.script.enchantment.SMCEnchantment.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    SMCEnchantment

    public static class SMCEnchantment.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Custom enchantment builder. You can create it with 
    Polyglot.import("enchantment");
